name: ferro_soil
description: Soil rich with metal fragments and mechanical residue. Favors biomechanical crops.

name: fungal_soil
description: Soft, organic soil with mycelial networks. Favors biological growth.

name: ash_soil
description: Neutral ground of burnt remains. Accepts both machine and nature.

name: pure_bio_soil
description: Rare untainted earth. Rejects mechanical influence.

name: scrap_heap
description: Piles of broken machinery. Only the hardiest biomechanical plants thrive.
